content: DBS Live Fresh Card YouTrip Lifestyle Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Nov 2018Is YouTrip top-up by DBS Live Fresh CC considered as online spend? 'Cause that's 5% rebate, and to forfeit that for the lesser % savings on currency exchange wouldn't seem ideal. ?1 answerAnswerBump0
